channel.title: The Old Republic
channel.description:
"Your account has been selected to participate in the Star Wars™: The Old Republic™ Game Testing Program."
Inb4 it's shit.

item.title: The Old Republic
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:2, topic:421256”]My brother is super-pissed about this because they are discontinuing Star Wars: Galaxies, and he has played it since the very beginning and has loads of experience and money…[/quote]Not the same company though. But yeah, to me Galaxies was the only true Star Wars MMO (in the beginning), because it was open world and player-driven. This is more or less a single player rpg played on a remote server.

Read full topic
